Package FDist

source code

This module provides code to work with FDist.

See http://www.rubic.rdg.ac.uk/~mab/software.html (old) and http://www.maths.bris.ac.uk/~mamab/ (new) for downloading the FDist tool by Mark Beaumont.

Classes: Record Holds FDist data.

Functions: read Parses a FDist record (file) into a Record object.

Submodules [hide private]
  • Bio.PopGen.FDist.Async: Asynchronous execution of Fdist and spliting of loads.
  • Bio.PopGen.FDist.Controller: This module allows you to control fdist.
  • Bio.PopGen.FDist.Utils

read(handle)

source code 

Parses FDist data into a Record object.

handle is a file-like object that contains a FDist record.
